pr_title: Check tls protocol version and throw warning

timeline.message: Check protocol version and throw warning

timeline.bodyText: There is already SSLProtocol enum in the driver
timeline.author: ulvii
lilgreenbird

timeline.bodyText: I think it might be better to put add a isMinTLS() (or something) method in SQLServerDriver? That way when a new version comes out it can be changed in 1 place only.
timeline.author: lilgreenbird

replies.bodyText: this is the only place we check tls version.
replies.author: rene-ye
